metadata.title: CVE-2018-11740 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libtskbase.a in The Sleuth Kit (TSK) from release 4.0.2 through to 4.6.1. An out-of-bounds read of a memory region was found in the function tsk_UTF16toUTF8 in tsk/base/tsk_unicode.c which could be leveraged by an attacker to disclose information or manipulated to read from unmapped memory causing a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
